name: Webshooters
description:
Webshooters is a superhero themed battler which can be played in singleplayer or multiplayer, in VR or screen space, it's up to you!

Step into the shoes of a hero and protect the city from a dangerous and powerful criminal group, or take care of yourself and work for the villains in their relentless crime spree. Swing between the skyscrapers, fly fast jets and powerful helicopters and race through the streets in on or offline game modes.

Project Status

Our game is currently in a prototype stage, despite that it's a blast and shaping up to be one of the most exciting VR mutliplayer games on the market. Whilst the game has been designed for VR play it can be played without VR, so anyone can jump in and start battling!

Stay tuned for new updates as we'd love to hear what heroes, villains and gamemodes you'd love to play!
